<Text: "Tere Mere Phere" (Hindi: तेरे मेरे फेरे English: Our wedding vows ) is an 2011 Hindi romantic comedy, Road film directed by well known and respected actress Deepa Sahi, and produced by the internationally acclaimed producer director Ketan Mehta and renowned singer Anup Jalota.>
